channel.title: Blogs on ACM Multimedia Asia 2022
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on ACM Multimedia Asia 2022

item.title: Registration site is now online
item.description: Our registration site is now open at: https://www.mmasia2022.org/registration/ We are looking forward to seeing you in person or online!

item.title: Program is now out
item.description: We have released the conference programs with full of nice papers, two tutorials, and a workshop! We are going to update the information of our keynote talks soon.

item.title: We are accepting applications for student travel grants
item.description: Check it for applying to student travel grants here!

item.title: Deadline Extended: Tutorial Proposals
item.description: The deadline for tutorial proposals has been extended to September 9th. Important dates We appreciate your consideration in providing a tutorial on your expertise.

item.title: Deadline Extended: Demo Papers
item.description: The deadline for demo paper submission has been extended to September 2nd. Important dates We are looking forward to your submissions!

item.title: [AGAIN] Deadline Extended: Regular/Short Papers
item.description: The deadline for regular/short paper submission has been again extended to August 8th. Important dates Final push!

item.title: Annoucement of Accepted Workshop: The 7th International Workshop on Affective Social Multimedia Computing
item.description: The other workshop, Affective Social Multimedia Computing, published the website! http://asmmc22.ubtrobot.com/# As of August 5th, the deadline for paper submission is September 7th. Consider sharing your ideas with the workshop!

item.title: Deadline Extended: Regular/Short Papers
item.description: The deadline for regular/short paper submission has been extended to August 5th. Important dates We are looking forward to your submissions!

item.title: Annoucement of Accepted Workshop: Multimedia Understanding with Pre-trained Models
item.description: One of our workshops, Multimedia Understanding with Pre-trained Models, published the website! http://staff.ustc.edu.cn/~zhwg/MMAsia_2022_workshop/index.html Be patient for further details!

item.title: Call for Regular/Short Papers Released
item.description: We released Call for Regular Papers and Call for Short Papers. We appreciate your consideration of submitting your research work to ACM Multimedia Asia 2022!

item.title: Call for Demo Papers Released
item.description: We released Call for Demo Papers. The notification date was also updated to Sep. 23, 2022. We appreciate your consideration of submitting your live and interactive demos to ACM Multimedia Asia 2022!

item.title: Call for Tutorials Released
item.description: We released Call for Tutorials. We welcome your tutorial proposals to reinforce the conference program!

item.title: Call for Workshop Proposals Released
item.description: We released Call for Workshop Proposals and updated Important Dates. The new deadline for workshop proposals is now June 30, 2022. We are waiting for your proposals!

item.title: Important dates are available
item.description: Important dates are now available here. Put it on your calendar!

item.title: ACM MM Asia Site Open
item.description: We are excited to announce the launch of ACM Multimedia Asia 2022 website! More information will be added soon.
